stories.title: Police use new device to seize money in bank accounts or on prepaid cards (2016)
Transformers can be trained to compute the roots of polynomials

stories.text:
After attempting to log in from a new session, FB locked my account and are demanding ID documents to recover it.

I have all of password, 2FA, e-mail and PGP enabled and available. In an attempt to raise the issue, I uploaded images with text explaining as much and requesting them to reopen the account without ID documents. (FWIW this would be the first time I supply any such documents to FB).

They just replied saying: "We can’t give you access to this account or help with your request until we receive an accepted form of ID that matches the information listed on the account. Learn more about the types of ID we accept in the Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/159096464162185"

Has anyone else in this situation been able to get around the need of providing them with photo ID?

(inb4 yes, good riddance and all, but would be nice to inform people of other channels before sunsetting)
stories.title: Ask HN: Anyone been able to recover FB account without uploading ID?
